html:
10.24.18  10:34 am   On the piano,do you use the classic or modified position when playing arpeggios?

     i have no idea what either of those would be

10.24.18  9:14 am   If you put a laptop on a desk, does it become a desktop?

     it becomes part of the desk

10.24.18  6:52 am   i get my period every full moon. what does that mean? am i some sort of beast?

     human

10.24.18  5:57 am   am I mediocre or is it just not for me?

     is what

10.24.18  1:57 am   How do you keep creating stuff though it feels so absurd at times? 

     wear a smock

10.24.18  1:03 am   What does ueqstions mean? Never heard pf that word.

     there is a massive amount of context clues here

10.23.18  11:01 pm   Are your songs for sale on Google play? Because a apparently you can purchase them on google play

     looks like you got that figured out

10.23.18  10:23 pm   Are you close to where you wanna be at?

     maybe about half way

10.23.18  9:33 pm   how long is the next song? please say 2:42

     3:08

10.23.18  9:05 pm   At the end the of the song, "bryant park", drink tea is what you recommend.

     oh no, if you take all song lyrics as real life recommendations, you could potentially get into a lot of trouble

      These days with your schedule so nice and disciplined, do you still drink tea?

     i have probably never had it except for all the times society forced me to try it over and over again despite not liking it any of those times before

      If so, decaffeinated or caffeine for focus? Beautiful song by the way.

     you are very kind

10.23.18  8:28 pm   How do we know that we exist?

     what does exist mean

10.23.18  8:25 pm   should i pursue a career that's secure but kinda boring or something less secure but super fun

     maybe you can do a little of both

10.23.18  8:24 pm   Why don't I feel at peace anymore 

     this could be due to war

10.23.18  7:57 pm   If you could go on a vacation anywhere in the world, where would you go?

     everywhere

10.23.18  7:44 pm   what is the thing you most like of this world?

     the dynamic quality to it

10.23.18  7:37 pm   Hey Bill, reading the question time logs I noticed it didnt look you got much sleep.

     it would be difficult to ascertain that because the question times are not when i answered them, it's when they were asked. which would often be while i am sleeping

      I hope you can get a good rest soon bud.

10.23.18  7:33 pm   Hey Bill, do you really love The Devil or did you just say that to spruce things up? Don't mean to judge, I'm just curious 

     who is the devil

10.23.18  7:28 pm   Some friends described me as being "Isolated while growing up" and that being isolated while growing up is a bad thing. Were you isolated while growing up and is it -really- a bad thing?

     our entire planet is isolated....

10.23.18  7:24 pm   How much time does it take you to think of your lyrics?

     10 seconds per lyric, on average

10.23.18  7:21 pm   when will you release more reality videos?

     yes

      take your time, as much as you like i guess.

     the less time i take, the less time is taken away from the other videos

10.23.18  7:21 pm   "the Moon is made of Cheese (but i cant taste it)" is probably my favorite song of yours right now. What made you cut it off when you did,

     it seemed like it had already gone on such a wild ride, and climaxed at least a couple of times, certainly with that orchestra bit. if it had gone on longer i would have had to unwrite that orchestra/church bit. that part was clearly leading to the end, i thought. but i have received the memos loud and clear and it won't happen again

     did you like it,

     i had a wild time writing it, and thought it was a breakthrough. but now i realize it's probably not as good as i thought

     and what do you think you did differently compared to some other songs?

     i've never pushed all the way around the keys (full circle) before. usually i don't recommend doing that but it happened

10.23.18  6:52 pm   I think everyone has a word that is ingrained into our lives. I think my word is focus. I have ideas, but they re broad and undefined, and all my life, people have been telling me to focus; pick one thing and stick to it. I know that I'll have to choose a path that will close doors and open others, I just have to find it.

     doesn't that mean that the word 'focus' is not ingrained in your life yet, but you wish for it to be in the future? just trying to clarify here

      What word is ingrained into your life?

     it usually changes every week or so

      A reoccurring theme, so to speak?

     expressing something infinite using finite tools

10.23.18  6:32 pm   What's it called when you have a minor chord, but there's a major 6th thrown into the mix?

     Cmin6, for example

      I have a song where it starts on G D A in the left hand below Bb E Bb in the right hand. What would you call this?

     Gmin6,9

      Also there's another one with G and D in the bass

     shouldn't really have 2 notes in the bass but maybe you meant a little higher than that

      plus C E F and Bb in the right, what's that called? 

     maybe Gmin11(13). i bet you could think of 100 other combinations of notes that would result in the same chord symbol .....

10.23.18  6:08 pm   How do I stop feeling sad

     how did you start

10.23.18  6:05 pm   okay so animals are people and we are people and we are also animals... maybe everything is the same 

     looks like you got that squared away

10.23.18  6:00 pm   My health class told me I should start thinking about what my career is going to be. I thinking of making video games or making music. I know you are more of a music guy but what do you think I should do 

     become a career counselor for all your classmates, for a week

10.23.18  5:36 pm   If an orange had a different name that isn't orange what would it be

     anything you can imagine

10.23.18  4:40 pm   have you ever considered making music 

     yes

10.23.18  4:02 pm   WHY DO I HAVE TO MENORIZE AND LEARN HOW TO WRITE KEY SIGNATURES IF I CAN PLAY ALL THE MINOR AND MAJOR AND WEIRD SCALES BY EAR GIVEN LITERALLY TWO MINUTES I DON'T UNDERSTANDDDDDDDDD UGGHGGGHHGGHGHHH

     i guess it depends whether you want to read and write

10.23.18  3:15 pm   How do you spruce up a 2-5-1 progression?

     usually they need to be spruced down

10.23.18  1:36 pm   Should I learn to juggle

     sure

10.23.18  1:17 pm   Which one, between preparing and thinking?

     which what

10.23.18  1:04 pm   does the quick schedule encourage more non-iterative tasks?

     no

10.23.18  12:57 pm   i know you're mostly self-taught in music, but is the same true for making videos?

     yes

      i don't think i've seen the "manipulating screenshots of text to achieve different effects" method anywhere before, and it's such a nifty workaround, i gotta know if it's by your own invention basically

     yes but i'm sure other people do it

10.23.18  11:18 am   On your lyrics page, there are lyrics to a lot of songs that are not on youtube. Where can those songs be found?

     probably on the songs page

      Also, why isn't New Canaan on your youtube songs playlist?

     i'm not sure

10.23.18  8:17 am   How are you making videos so fast? You were not so quick before.

     i must have somehow aquired superpowers

10.23.18  6:41 am   how much do you think money matters in life

     i'd say about a 4.2

10.23.18  3:24 am   are there any deeper meanings within your lyrics?

     than what

      is that up to the listener?

     yes

10.23.18  3:23 am   After you decide you're done making songs every two weeks, what is the next thing you'd like to do? Update the reality section?

     yes but hopefully at the same time

      Another long video?

     yes

     Other things?

     yes but hopefully at the same time

10.23.18  3:15 am   What have you studied?

     the world around me

10.23.18  2:53 am   try using more air in your diaphragm to reach higher notes and not strain your voice

     easier said than done

10.23.18  1:47 am   Are you ever going to use your notebook or reality pages again?

     yes

     Or are you going to keep them in the box of "I'll update them later"?

     the problem with having more than 10 different types of content is it is impossible to do all of them at the same time unless you do all of them at an impossibly slow pace. maybe you've had this experience before ....

10.23.18  1:43 am   How to be interesting

     what do you find interesting

10.23.18  12:48 am   how do you make your songs so good?

     you are very kind but i don't know

10.23.18  12:19 am   did you really fall in love on the Q train or did that just sound the nicest of all the options

     it's based on listening to music on the q train

10.22.18  8:54 pm   does vinyl really sound better?

     i'm not sure

10.22.18  8:37 pm   For the record, I'd buy your record, if you'd record one

     i have recorded many. go ahead and buy all of them. unless you're...... bluffing

10.22.18  8:37 pm   can you give us the letters in your next song's title so we can try to unscarmble it?

     jungle-nylon.org (log on)

10.22.18  8:35 pm   how do you feel about the fact that your songs are playing in my head constantly as i go about my day and it pumps me the HECK up and motivates me to do the things i'm s'posed to

     pretty good

10.22.18  8:25 pm   Why did you walk 8 hours a day for two days?

     to become better aquainted with the world around me
